Woundrous Item

A user may have only one hearthstone at any given time, and it is attuned as a Teleport Circle. Requiring 3 actions (object interaction) to activate, the hearthstone teleports the user to where they last called home. When used, it takes a day to recharge. An adventurer may alter his hearthstone‘s location to any indoor building he has spent more than 24 hours in, which replaces the teleport circle‘s location.

This stone is given to every adventurer who leaves his city.
